comments:

the cursor on variable "token" on line 122, and execute Refactor > Generalize
Type.  The dialog warns "Internal Error during computation of valid types", and
the following is written to the log:

*** Bug 132840 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
This could be a RC3 candidate is easy to fix.

Created an attachment (id=40369)
FullConstraintCreateor.java.diff

Patch of how far I got with this - this fixes the reported error, but there are some details missing (see TODOs). 

The tricky case with deciding whether the last argument matches the element type of the vararg-array or the vararg array itself is not a problem, as 'Generalize Type Declaration' does not work on array type anyway.
